daily_fact: On November 23rd, 54 Below will host a special show featuring talented male guest singers, celebrating the vibrant musical community of New York City and its commitment to live performance.
topline_md: Severe weather in New York has led to flight cancellations and stranded students due to flooding, while the NYC Council approved a $375 million redevelopment project, and the upcoming Veterans Day Parade is set to celebrate military service members.
